snippet.title: Easy Red 2: Shanghai - Nanking | Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
↓↓↓↓↓↓↓ *INFO, LINKS AND RELEASE DATE* ↓↓↓↓↓↓↓
Releasing the 28th of March, 2025 on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1324780/Easy_Red_2/?l=italian
Releasing few weeks later for Xbox and Nintendo Switch.

*EASY RED 2: SHANGHAI - NANKING*
In response to Japanese incursions in the north, China launches its own offensive to eject the enemy from Shanghai!
In Easy Red 2: Shanghai-Nanking, you will fight for control of Shanghai, and the conflict will spread to locations such as: Luodian, Baoshan, Wusong, Jinshanwei, Hongkou, Suzhou creek, Chunhua, the Yuhuatai hills and the city of Nanjing.  

*NEW FEATURES*
 •New campaign set in China: includes the Shanghai and Nanjing maps with 23 new missions
• The Chinese faction with new voiceovers. 
• New Chinese and Japanese uniforms, for a total of more than 70 clothing items. 
• New vehicles and aircraft: A4N, Hawk-3, Type 24 HMG, Type 89, Chinese versions of the P40, I16, T26, and Panzer I, Vickers Crossley and much more!
 • New weapons: Type 24 rifle, Hanyang, Zb 26, Chinese MP18, SIG20, Fn Type D and more!
• Over 100 new props and buildings for the Mission and Map Editor. 

*STAY TUNED*
This DLC is just the beginning! Brace for ongoing updates and improvements, promising exciting additions like new weapons, vehicles, uniforms, and missions in the future. Your journey through history is far from over!
